member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC1
member.summary: Describes a compressed buffer for decoding.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC1.DataOffset
member.summary: The offset of the relevant data from the beginning of the buffer, in bytes. This value must be zero.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC1.pIV
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains an initialization vector (IV) for encrypted data. If the decode buffer does not contain encrypted data, set this member to NULL.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC1.IVSize
member.summary: The size of the buffer specified in the pIV parameter. If pIV is NULL, set this member to zero.

summary.para: A pointer to an array of structures, which indicates exactly which bytes in the decode buffer are encrypted and which are in the clear. If the decode buffer does not contain encrypted data, set this member to NULL.
Values in the sub sample mapping blocks are relative to the start of the decode buffer.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BUFFER_DESC1.SubSampleMappingCount
member.summary: The number of structures specified in the pSubSampleMappingBlocks parameter. If pSubSampleMappingBlocks is NULL, set this member to zero.
